short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to change CSS within Unleashed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hate Not Having Unleashed Fun? Well... I do. But I really like Unleashed. Here are my current Candies.

Especially when capturing backups and screenshots of how the Xero integration works. I would like to introduce you to a friend that allows you to open all the accordions for the Xero Extension.

Why?
During our research, people need to capture screenshots or pull data in a streamlined method. I would like a method that stretches them all open so I can see what lies behind them...

Easy to Use
Built for teams, one toggle switch to activate, deactivate and reactivate. You can play around with it as much as you want, you do not even need to become bored. Its great.

FEATURES: (1.1)
- BULK EXPORT
- FULL, SEPERATE EXPORTS
- RAINBOW BANNER
- DARKMODE (WIP - N/A Current Build)
- XERO ACCORDION

WHAT TO EXPECT?
- DARKMODE TO BE FULLY COMPLETE
- HEADER CANDIES
- RANDOM NUMBER GENERATOR
- CALCULATOR?
- QUICK FACTS/STATS
